DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the role of high dose chemotherapy with autologous hematopoietic cell transplantation in the treatment of Hodgkin's Disease.
DOC.brief_title: High Dose Chemotherapy Followed By PBSC Rescue for HD
DOC.detailed_description: Use of High Dose Chemotherapy Followed by Peripheral Blood Stem Cell Rescue for Relapsed or Resistant Hodgkin's Disease
DOC.criteria: adequate organ function recurrent HD CNS disease no prior malignancy
